describe: Liberia is a country located on the west coast of Africa. It is known for its rich history, diverse culture, and lush rainforests. The country was founded by freed American and Caribbean slaves in the 19th century, and its capital, Monrovia, is named after U.S. President James Monroe. Liberia is home to a variety of ethnic groups and languages, and it boasts beautiful beaches and vibrant wildlife.

cities.name: üèù Monrovia
cities.geographical_location: Located on the Atlantic coast in the northwest of Liberia.
cities.climate: Monrovia has a tropical monsoon climate with a wet season from May to October and a dry season from November to April.
cities.famous_cuisine: Jollof rice, palm butter, and cassava leaf stew.

cities.name: üèù Buchanan
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the central coast of Liberia, southeast of Monrovia.
cities.climate: Buchanan experiences a tropical climate with significant rainfall throughout the year.
cities.famous_cuisine: Fufu and soup, fried plantains, and pepper soup.
